pullrequest.title: Fix circular dependency between physics and sensors (issue #1516)

content.raw:
ya looks like sensors visualizations still works thanks to the `~/sensor` topic. The sensor msg received from `~/model/info` gets filtered out in `Scene::ProcessSensorMsg` because topic string is empty.

We should probably let users know about the missing fields in `~/model/info` since the topic is open to everyone
content.html:
ya looks like sensors visualizations still works thanks to the ~/sensor topic. The sensor msg received from ~/model/info gets filtered out in Scene::ProcessSensorMsg because topic string is empty.

We should probably let users know about the missing fields in ~/model/info since the topic is open to everyone
